articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Winter storm lashes US east coast with hurricane-strength winds and record blizzards - ABC News
articles.description: Five east coast American states declare weather emergencies, after a massive winter storm hits with hurricane-strength winds and record blizzards.
articles.content:
Five east coast American states have declared weather emergencies, after a massive winter storm hit with hurricane-strength winds and record blizzards.
<ul><li>Wind gusts reached 134kph in some area… [+2609 chars]

articles.title: Sammie Okposo caught in the web of infidelity - Guardian Nigeria
articles.description: In a rare occurrence, prominent Christian Gospel singer, Sammie Okposo, has become the latest celebrity to publicly admit and apologise for infidelity to their spouse, as he broke news on his entanglement with an American lady ...
